name: Why The Chicken Crossed The Road
name_original: Why The Chicken Crossed The Road
description:
A chicken learns about the fast food chain RGC (Really Good Chicken) and decides to take revenge.

This is a short but difficult 2D bullet hell, originally made as a school project for my games programming class.

This was all made in about 10 weeks, including the textures and music.

You can listen to and download the soundtrack, on Gamejolt   https://gamejolt.com/games/WTCCTR/559190
